thread.title: BRIEF-Ofcom grants consent to two trades of spectrum in 1452-1492 MHz band
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Ofcom grants consent to two trades of spectrum in 1452-1492 MHz band

title: BRIEF-Ofcom grants consent to two trades of spectrum in 1452-1492 MHz band
text:
BRIEF-Ofcom grants consent to two trades of spectrum in 1452-1492 MHz band Sept 22 
Sept 22 Office of Communications: 
* Consent for spectrum trades in 1452-1492 MHz band 
* Received trade applications in August 2015, and has considered them under wireless telegraphy (mobile spectrum trading) regulations 2011 - as amended in 2015 Source text for Eikon: Trending On Reuters
